snippet: The class’s seven members released a statement on Friday blaming the administration for the program’s diminishing quality.
abstract: Seven students, entire 2016 graduate class of University of Southern California’s Roski School of Art and Design, withdraw from university in protest, citing loss of studio visits and guaranteed teaching assistant programs as factors that diminish quality of program.
lead_paragraph: The class’s seven members released a statement on Friday blaming the administration for the program’s diminishing quality.

headline.main: U.S.C. Fine Arts StudentsDrop Out in Protest
headline.print_headline: U.S.C. Fine Arts Students Drop Out in Protest
